abstract: A set of animatable weight values that collectively represent the blending amounts for all the blend shapes’ blend targets.

# BlendShapeWeights

**Structure**

A set of animatable weight values that collectively represent the blending amounts for all the blend shapes’ blend targets.

## Declaration

```swift
struct BlendShapeWeights
```

## Operators

- **==(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two collections of weights are equal.

## Initializers

- **init()**: Initializes a collection of animatable weights for a blend shape.
- **init(_:)**: Initializes a collection of weights for a single blend shape.
- **init(arrayLiteral:)**: Creates a collection of animatable weights using the argument elements for a blend shape.

## Instance Properties

- **endIndex**: An index to the last weight in the collection.
- **startIndex**: An index to the first weight in the collection.

## Instance Methods

- **index(after:)**: Returns the position in the sequence of the weight that follows the given position.
- **index(before:)**: Returns the position in the sequence of the weight that preceeds the given position.

## Subscripts

- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses a single weight in the collection at the given index.

## Type Aliases

- **BlendShapeWeights.ArrayLiteralElement**: The type of the elements of an array literal.
- **BlendShapeWeights.Element**: An individual weight in the collection.
- **BlendShapeWeights.Index**: A position of an individual weight in the collection.

## Blend shape management

- **BlendShapeWeightsComponent**: A component that provides access to the current weights associated with all blend shape meshes on an entity.
- **BlendShapeWeightsMapping**: A mapping of blend weights to the target meshes that those weights affect.
- **BlendShapeWeightsData**: A structure that encapsulates the blend shape name, blend shape weights and the names of those weights to be stored by the blend shape weights set.
- **BlendShapeWeightsSet**: A custom collection of named blend shape weights.

## Conforms To

- AnimatableData
- BidirectionalCollection
- Collection
- Copyable
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- MutableCollection
- Sequence
